This is where **I share everything I know.** I develop it mainly for myself, but I believe you'll find something valuable too.

Please remember, this page will never be finished. Much of the information here will change over time because **what is true for me today may not be true tomorrow**. This reflects my approach to the ever-changing world.

## The Most Important Topics [#](#the-most-important-topics)

* My [Process](./Core/Process.html) guides me towards my set [Direction](./Core/Direction.html), rooted in my [Values](./Core/Values.html) and self-awareness ([Knowing thyself](./Core/Knowing thyself.html)).
* How I learn through my [Learning System](./Core/Learning System.html).
* Everything I know about [Mental Models](./Mental Models/Mental Models.html).
* My thoughts on the [Books](./Books/Books.html) I read.
* A list and my opinions on [Apps](./Tools/Apps.html).
* Thoughts on my [Hardware](./Tools/Hardware.html).
* Perspectives and ideas on [Automation](./Tools/Automation.html).
* Notes on Programming, Design, Marketing, and Business.
* Additional notes on my [Process](./Core/Process.html).
* All my free and paid publications.

## Where you can find me? [#](#where-you-can-find-me)

I enjoy chatting with people, so feel free to share or ask anything. If I don't respond, don't take it personally. I'll still do my best.

You can find me on [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/%5Foverment/), [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/overment), [Substack](https://techsistence.com/) and [X](https://x.com/%5Foverment)
